description: Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

Our app is there for you, whether you’re on the move, at work or just relaxing at home. Tap, log in and check your balance, make payments or plan for your next big dream. Being there for you, it’s a people thing.

FEEL AT HOME

•	Use your face or fingerprint to log in faster and more securely.
•	Just open the app and explore your spaces to get quick access to everything you need, from statements to investments.

NO CARD? NO WORRIES

•	Whether your card is lost, stolen or simply misplaced, relax knowing you can freeze it, order a new one, or look up your card details.

BE IN THE KNOW

•	Stay ahead of your bills - your upcoming payments summary lets you know what’s being paid and when.
•	Spending insights helps you understand where your money goes every month.
•	Check your credit score and get personalised hints and tips to help you stay in control of your money and move closer to your big dreams, like getting a new home.
•	Never miss important updates again: personalise your notifications to stay on top of everything.

IN FOR A PENNY

•	Make every penny count with Save the Change. It rounds up what you spend on your debit card to the nearest pound and moves the change into a savings account.
•	Get cashback from your favourite retailers with Everyday Offers.

CONTACTING YOU

We won't contact you any more than normal if you use the app. But please stay alert to email, text messages or phone calls that appear to be from us. Criminals may try to trick you into giving them sensitive personal or account information. We'll never contact you to ask for these details. Any emails from us will always greet you personally using your title and surname and either the last 4 digits of your account number or the last part of your postcode '*** 1AB'. Any text messages we send you will come from Halifax.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

We don't charge you to use our services, but your mobile operator might charge for some things, such as downloading or using the app, so please check with them. Services may be affected by phone signal and functionality.

When you use this app, we collect anonymous location data to help combat fraud, fix bugs and improve future services.

The app is available to customers with a UK personal account and valid registered phone number. IOS14 or above required. Device registration required. Terms and conditions apply.

Freeze and unfreeze certain types of transactions securely 24/7 for extra peace of mind or if you’ve temporarily misplaced your card.

Touch ID requires at least iPhone 6s running iOS 14.0 or above or iPad (5th generation), iPad Pro, iPad Air 2, or iPad mini 3 (or later models). Face ID requires either iPhone X or later models, or iPad Pro with Face ID capability (2018 onwards).

Apple, the Apple logo, iPad, iPad Air, iPad mini, iPad Pro, iPhone, Touch ID and Face ID are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.

Halifax is a division of Bank of Scotland plc. This app and Mobile Banking are operated by Bank of Scotland plc (registered in Scotland (No. SC327000)

Registered office: The Mound, Edinburgh, EH1 1YZ). Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority.

LEGAL INFORMATION
This app is designed and intended for Halifax UK customers to access and service UK personal products. It should only be downloaded for this purpose.

While the app can be downloaded from App Stores outside the UK, this does not mean we are inviting, offering or recommending you engage in any transactions or establish a customer relationship with Halifax.

Any confirmation that our product or service complies with European Union law is made to Apple to meet its legal requirements. This does not imply any representation, warranty, or statement to you and should not be relied upon for entering into any contract.

The FNB Banking App embraces the future of help and our new look and feel will do just that 
Some features to look out for: 

Simple straight-forward navigation – We’ve added bottom navigation to make it easier to find what you need, when you need it. 
Switch users easily – Multiple profiles?  No problem!  Switch seamlessly between different user profiles by selecting profiles located on the bottom navigation and then select “switch user”. 
Introducing the Action Panel – Bringing your banking features front and center, like payments, transfers, my cards, and cash withdrawals. 
Chat Pay – A revolutionary new feature called Chat Pay that allows you to pay any FNB customer via a simple chat, all within FNB’s secure ecosystem giving you peace of mind that the person you are paying has been verified and approved.  It’s that simple. 

What is Pay? 
We have renamed Payments to Pay.  This feature will provide you with access to categories within payments such as pay, receive, pay bills, payment settings, and payment history. 

What is Secure Messaging? 
Chat to other FNB/RMB customers securely on the App by granting access to your contact list.  Features within Secure Messaging include Chat Pay, voice notes, attachments, share location, etc.

Introducing bKash App, with an elegant look, and exciting features, to make your life simpler and easier. Register a bKash account right from the app in a few minutes, add money from your bank account or card, and get going. Recharge mobile balance, scan QR to pay at your favorite stores, pay utility and other bills from home, send money to people, and get different lifestyle services, all in a highly secure mobile money app. Discover the best bKash offers near you, get suggestions from bKash on what services you can explore next, and use shortcuts for your most frequent transactions in bKash App.

FAST ACCOUNT REGISTRATION
No bKash account? No worry! You can now explore bKash App, its services, features, and offers without an account. After you are done exploring, you can register a new bKash account in a few minutes right from bKash App, using your National ID.

ADD MONEY FROM BANK ACCOUNT & CARD
Now you have an account, but you need money in it, right? Transfer funds instantly from your bank account or card, to any bKash account using the Add Money service.

SUPER FAST QR TRANSACTIONS
Use the Scan QR button in the home screen at stores and shops for Payment, at Agent points for Cash Out or with other bKash users for Send Money – faster and error-free.

OFFERS NEAR YOU
Get the best bKash offers at your nearest payment points, all in one place under the Offers section in your home screen.

TRANSACTION SHORTCUTS
In the My bKash section, use shortcuts for your most frequent transactions to make them faster.

SUGGESTIONS FOR YOU
Find suggestions from bKash on what other services, Merchants, billers, and other partners you can try out.

INBOX – TRANSACTIONS & PROMOTIONS
Access notifications on your latest bKash transactions and promotional offers, from the Inbox button at the bottom of your home screen.

MOBILE RECHARGE
Recharge mobile balance or pay postpaid mobile bills for all major mobile network operators very quickly using amount shortcuts:

• Robi
• Airtel
• Banglalink
• Grameenphone
• Teletalk

Let bKash App take care of latest offers and best deals of your mobile operator. View and purchase recharge-based Internet, Voice and Bundle offers of different mobile operators in Mobile Recharge.

PAY YOUR BILLS
Make payments for your monthly utility bills such as electricity, gas, internet, and other services, right from the comfort of your home.

GET DIFFERENT LIFESTYLE SERVICES
Want a one-stop-shop for your lifestyle needs? Let bKash app be your companion for food delivery, online shopping, bus, train, launch and air tickets, movie tickets, hotel booking for traveling, and many more.

HIGHLY SECURE MOBILE BANKING
We take the security of your bKash account very seriously. We send you an OTP to verify your bKash account during first log-in. bKash App also asks for your PIN during both log-in, and transactions.

EASE OF ACCESS
Use the app in either Bangla or English, and change between the two whenever you want.

STATEMENT
Exert greater control over your mobile wallet by accessing your detailed transaction history, and a monthly transaction summary.

CHECK LIMIT
Know how much more you can transact by having a real-time view of your transaction limits.

ONE-TAP BALANCE CHECK
Checking your balance is just a tap away. We also help protect your data by hiding the balance after a few seconds.

GREATER TRANSPARENCY & CONTROL
Have greater visibility over your bKash transactions – while entering the amount, you will see your available balance, auto-calculated service charge, and projected new balance – all before completing the transaction.

16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

Сервис позволяет налогоплательщику физическому лицу в режиме онлайн контролировать наличие начислений и задолженности по налогам, взаимодействовать с налоговыми органами в электронном виде.

- просмотр сведений о доходах

developer: FIRST UKRAINIAN INTERNATIONAL BANK PUBLIC JOINT STOCK COMPANY
description:
PUMB is your personal mobile banking app, offering a wide range of financial services to make managing your finances convenient and rewarding. With the PUMB app, you can access banking services directly from your smartphone. Open and manage cards with no fees, transfer money, buy currency online, apply for credit, and even pay in installments – all in one place.

Main Features of PUMB:

• Commission-Free Card Opening and Management: Open a “vseKARTA” debit card or a “vseMOZHU Online” credit card through the PUMB mobile banking app, and top up your card.
• Easy Money Transfers: Transfer money from your "vseKARTA" and "vseMOZHU Online" cards using personal funds to other bank cards in hryvnia without any fees, using the recipient's card number or phone number.
• All-In-One Online Banking: Pay utility bills and traffic fines by IBAN or top up your mobile phone.
• Get Credit via Online Banking App: Apply for credit online with a credit limit of up to 300,000 UAH and a grace period of up to 62 days.
• Pay in Installments with service Splachuite chastynamy: No payments on the day of purchase.
• Get international money transfers from WesternUnion, PrivatMoney, Ria, and MoneyGram with no fees.
• Open Deposits: Open deposits directly in the PUMB app to earn extra interest on your savings.
• Save with MoneyBox: Use MoneyBox to grow your savings, earning 5% per annum on your account balance.
• Buy Currency Online: Order cash through this bank app or buy dollars and euros directly in the app, with a monthly limit equivalent to 49,999 UAH.
• Receive payments from the state under the eVidnovlennia and ePidtrymka programs through the bank app. Join the “Cashback. Made in Ukraine” program.
• Simplify your regular transactions by creating templates and setting up auto payments.
• Contactless Payments: Pay for purchases with Google Pay/Apple Pay.

Credit card. The maximum loan amount is UAH 300,000. The real annual interest rate is up to 44.28%. The maximum loan term is 12 months with auto-renewal for the same period.

Splachuite chastynamy. The maximum loan amount is UAH 300,000. The maximum loan term is 24 months. The real annual interest rate is up to 48.31%. There is no down payment and zero fee for the term from the store.

The “Invite a Friend” promotion runs from 03.11 to 21.12.2025, throughout Ukraine, in areas under Ukrainian control and not occupied, as well as outside Ukraine. The bonus is credited after the first payment made with the vseMOZHU Online card from PUMB, in the amount of UAH 100 or more. The bonus is UAH 500 for a card with a credit limit and UAH 200 for a card without a credit limit. The credit limit is set by the bank. Taxes and fees are withheld.

Details on the terms and conditions of the promotion: at pumb.ua in the “About the Bank / Promotions” section.

Get bonus 200 UAH: to participate in the promotion, open your first card in the PUMB app and make one payment with it for an amount of UAH 100 or more. The promotion runs from 03.11 to 21.12.2025, throughout Ukraine, including areas under Ukrainian control and not occupied, as well as outside Ukraine. For details, visit pumb.ua in the “About the Bank/Promotions” section.

The credit limit is set by the banks decision.

Cashback of up to 5% is accrued for orders made through the "Splachuite chastynamy" installment plan via the Cashback stores in the PUMB app.

Cashback categories are determined individually for each participant and may vary from month to month. To receive cashback from the bank, connect the required categories in the PUMB app before making a payment. To receive cashback from partners, connect the required partner in the PUMB app before making a payment. Detailed terms, restrictions, and exceptions for cashback accrual are available on the PUMB website in the cashback section (pumb.ua/cashback) and in the PUMB app in the Benefits section.

The state registration of banks No.73 dated 23.12.1991. The Bank license of the NBU No.8 dated 06.10.2011.

Digital Banking experience includes tools to make your life easier. Find out how you can benefit from greater convenience today: 

• Mobile Deposit: Deposit anywhere, anytime with your mobile device. Enjoy a new redesigned experience of how to deposit with Digital Banking. 
• Account information: account balances, last payments, and transfers are available as soon as you log in. Transactions of your deposit accounts and credit cards are easier to identify. You will also be able to view your deposits, payments, and transfers history.
• Payments and transfers: Pay your bills, credit cards, and loans. Transfer money between your accounts and to other FirstBank accounts. 
• Services and features: You can make stop payments, request check copies and account statements, set up travel notifications, reorder checks, cancel debit cards, request auto letters, and much more.  
• Push Notifications: Configure to start receiving push notifications through the Settings option. 
• The quick actions feature makes it easy and faster to access frequent actions such as Transfers, Credit card payments, and branches and ATMs locator. 
• Security: You can change your PIN, password, security question and answer, plus activate the Touch ID and Face ID features for added security. 
 
Download Digital Banking to get started!

Coinbase is the global leader and only crypto company listed in the S&P 500 to seamlessly buy, sell, trade, store, and stake crypto. We’re the only publicly traded crypto exchange in the U.S.

SUPPORTED ASSETS¹
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), USD Coin (USDC), Cardano (ADA), Polygon (MATIC), Polkadot (DOT), Solana (SOL), Tether (USDT), Uniswap (UNI), Dogecoin (DOGE), Pepe (PEPE), and hundreds of other cryptocurrencies.

Here’s a little taste of what Coinbase offers:

COINBASE ONE
Get more out of crypto with Coinbase One.
- Zero trading fees², priority support, and more.³ 

BUY, SELL & MANAGE CRYPTO
- Coinbase is a global leading platform to build, manage, and track your crypto portfolio.
- Send and receive crypto.
- Stake crypto and earn yield on cryptocurrencies like Ethereum and Cardano¹
- Set up automatic or recurring buys.
- Follow the latest crypto news and track prices.
- Transfer crypto internationally.

PUBLICLY TRADED CRYPTO EXCHANGE
- Coinbase is the only publicly traded, US-headquartered crypto exchange (NASDAQ: COIN).
- Our financials are public and audited quarterly by a Big 4 accounting firm.
- Encryption and security are at the core of our platform, and our security team is constantly working to make sure you and your assets are protected from emerging threats.

POWERFUL TOOLS FOR ADVANCED CRYPTO TRADERS
- Buy and sell crypto using advanced trading tools and earn staking rewards¹
- Access in-depth technical analysis, advanced real-time order books, and charting powered by TradingView.
- Advanced tools to research and analyze crypto markets to inform trading decisions.

NEED MORE HELP?
Visit help.coinbase.com for information and to contact Coinbase Support.

PRIVACY
View Coinbase’s legal privacy policy at https://www.coinbase.com/legal/privacy

Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high‑risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. Take 2 mins to learn more at www.coinbase.com/uk-fca-info
—
Trusted by users: Based on the results of a 2024 Qualtrics survey conducted in the UK. Read more here: https://www.coinbase.com/blog/recent-data-shows-coinbase-is-the-most-trusted-name-in-crypto

¹ Available in select territories.
² Zero trading fees: Coinbase Advanced excluded; a spread applies.
³ A Coinbase One subscription renews automatically and requires recurring payments. Benefits vary by region. 


You earn rewards from the protocol, not Coinbase. Coinbase acts only as a service provider connecting you, the validators, and the protocol. We pass along any rewards earned from staking, minus a transparent Coinbase fee.
